how_to_use_1_subtitle: We aim for an ordinary Christian life that makes us closer to the Lord every day by communicating with God.
how_to_use_2_subtitle: We help you set and achieve your daily goals. Please register as a member and login on the left menu before setting goals.
how_to_use_3_subtitle: On the goal-setting screen, check and save the items to be performed every day. If you set an alarm for QT and prayer time, we will remind you at that time.
how_to_use_4_subtitle: On the main screen, you can check the achievement of today's goals, and if you do not achieve it, you can go to the QT record, reading Bible, and thanks diary screen.
how_to_use_5_subtitle: On the calendar page, you can check the past goal achievement.
how_to_use_6_subtitle: Meditate, pray, read the Bible, and give thanks every day to God to spend deeper fellowship with God.
